snippet: When employment statistics are adjusted to account for demographic changes in the labor force, they indicate that the overall jobs situation has improved.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column notes that latest data showing labor force participation rate is at 35-year low, which some politicians cite as evidence unemployment has not declined, does not tell whole picture; asserts that when figures are adjusted to account for demographic changes in the labor force, they indicate overall jobs situation has improved.
lead_paragraph: When employment statistics are adjusted to account for demographic changes in the labor force, they indicate that the overall jobs situation has improved.

headline.print_headline: Changes in Labor Force Mask Gains in the Jobs Situation
headline.main: Changes in Labor Force Mask Gains in the Jobs Situation
